name: IT201_Sprint04_Josue_Benavides
description:
Sprint Project V.4 (part 4)

Josue Benavides

Right click - to paint.
Change shape - q,w,e.

Color Tab - to change Colors and opacity (click in the apply button to confirm changes)

Transform Tab 
- to change size, rotation, randomize the brush size and color, and also animate the shapes by pressing r,t, or y; you just need to toggle animations first.

Time Tab -to Change the time to destroy (brushes), change the environment according to current time, make the clock continuous, or turn  the drawing plane on/off.

UPDATES
- added a clear(brushstrokes) to the transform tab
- fixed instructions.
